text:
Applet sends an Object through ObjectOutputStream created from URLConnection.
Servlet-side: While trying create ObjectInputStream from HttpServletRequest, StreamCorruptedException: Caught EOF exception while reading, is thrown.

Servlet responds fine again using ObjectOutputStream.
Out-of-process/Stand-alone no corruption occurs.
creator: dev@tomcat.apache.org
Larry.Isaacs@sas.com
text:
There isn't enough information to try to duplicate this in current Tomcat
releases. Since this is reported against Tomcat 3.1.1 where no further
development is occurring, I'm marking it "invalid".

If this problem is found in a current release of Tomcat, please log a new
bug report.

creator: sarecz@iqsoft.hu
